metadata.title: CVE-2020-35535 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In LibRaw, there is an out-of-bounds read vulnerability within the"LibRaw::parseSonySRF()" function (libraw\src\metadata\sony.cpp) whenprocessing srf files.

criterions.comment: libraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
